Type Guard

Namespace Machine.Fakes.Sdk

Container class for (as it name implies) guard clauses.

void AgainstArgumentNull(object argument, string argumentName)

Verifies that the argument supplied by argument is not null.
Parameters
object argument

The object to be checked.

string argumentName

The name of the object that will be used when raising an ArgumentException.

void AgainstNullOrEmptyString(string argument, string argumentName)

Verifies that the argument supplied by argument is neither null nor an empty String.
Parameters
string argument

The object to be checked.

string argumentName

The name of the object that will be used when raising an ArgumentException.

void ArgumentAssignableTo(Type argument, Type assignmentTargetType)

Verifies that the type supplied by argument is assignable to the type specified by assignmentTargetType.
Parameters
Type argument

The type to be checked.

Type assignmentTargetType

The target type.
